summary: DT: THE CONTACT STATED  THERE WAS NHTSA RECALL 03V3270000: CONCERNING HAZARD FLASHING WARNING LIGHTS SWITCH FAILURE.  THIS VEHICLE EXPERIENCED SAME PROBLEM  AS INDICATED IN THE RECALL, BUT WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL DUE TO VINE. THE CONTACT  WILL HAVE THE REPAIRS  DONE  AT HIS EXPENSE. *AK
